name: TetanusToxoidDiphtheriaTdVaccineAllergyIntolerance
title: Tetanus toxoid, diphtheria (Td) Vaccine Allergy Intolerance
purpose: (Clinical Focus: SNOMED CT codes and RxNORM codes that could be returned by the FHIR Allergy Intolerance resource, and would indicate allergy or intolerance to (Td) Vaccine),(Data Element Scope: ALLERGY_INTOLERANCE: (Td) Vaccine),(Inclusion Criteria: RxNORM codes for individual medications that are (Td) Vaccines, and various SNOMED CT codes that would indicate allergy or intolerance to (Td) Vaccines as a class, or individual (Td) Vaccine),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
